info.name: apply_video_model
info.description: A module that applies an eta.core.learning.VideoModel on a video

inputs.name: video_frames_dir
inputs.description: a directory containing the frames of the video

inputs.name: input_labels_path
inputs.description: an optional input VideoLabels file to which to add the predictions

outputs.name: output_labels_path
outputs.description: a VideoLabels file containing the predictions

parameters.name: model
parameters.description: an eta.core.learning.VideoModelConfig describing the eta.core.learning.VideoModel to use
